item.description:
Saxophonist Florencia Gonzalez will be at Ryles Jazz Club together with a group of South American musicians to perform some of the most popular rhythms from Uruguay such as the CANDOMBE, influenced by the Bantu legacy (brought to the Rio de la Plata from frica). Their music is from composers such as Ruben Rada, Eduardo Mateo and Jaime Roos fusing the rich Afro-Uruguayan rhythms with bright arrangements written by Florencia Gonzalez and Fernando Michelin. Ryles has a good menue, is good for chatting and has a small dance floor...!
vamos la!
item.name: Florencia Gonzalez - Candombe Group (Uruguay)
